amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the YouthBuild program by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $10 million (by offset) the amount appropriated for HUD's Community Development Fund for the Youthbuild program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 209 (Roll no. 284).
